info.title: API de Recursos Humanos PAE
info.description: Backend para la gesti√≥n del personal y su disponibilidad.

post.description:
Creates a new employee in the system.
- **document_number**: Must be unique.
- Raises a 409 Conflict error if the document number already exists.
- Requires 'nutripae-rh:create' permission.

get.summary: Get a list of all employees with filters
get.description:
Retrieves a paginated list of employees. 
It can be filtered by name, document, role, and active status.
- Requires 'nutripae-rh:list' permission.

parameters.name: search

schema.description: Search by name or document number
schema.title: Search

parameters.description: Search by name or document number

schema.title: Response Read Employees Endpoint Api V1 Employees  Get

get.description:
Retrieves a single employee by their unique ID.
- Raises a 404 Not Found error if the employee does not exist.
- Requires 'nutripae-rh:read' permission.

put.description:
Updates an existing employee's information.
- Raises a 404 Not Found error if the employee does not exist.
- Requires 'nutripae-rh:update' permission.

delete.description:
Deletes an employee from the system.
- Raises a 404 Not Found error if the employee does not exist.
- Returns the deleted employee's data upon success.
- Requires 'nutripae-rh:delete' permission.

post.description:
Creates a new daily availability record for an employee.
- Raises 404 if the employee does not exist or is inactive.
- Raises 409 if an availability record for that employee and date already exists.
- Requires 'nutripae-rh:create' permission.

get.summary: Get detailed availabilities by date range
get.description:
Retrieves detailed availability records within a date range.
- Optionally filters by a specific employee.
- Requires 'nutripae-rh:list' permission.

schema.title: Response Get Detailed Availabilities Endpoint Api V1 Availabilities  Get

get.summary: Get all availabilities for an employee
get.description:
Retrieves all availability records for a specific employee.
- Raises 404 if the employee does not exist.
- Requires 'nutripae-rh:read' permission.

schema.title: Response Get Availabilities For Employee Endpoint Api V1 Availabilities Employee  Employee Id  Get
Response Get Document Types Endpoint Api V1 Options Document Types Get
Response Get Genders Endpoint Api V1 Options Genders Get

get.summary: Get all available operational roles with employee count

schema.title: Response Get Operational Roles Endpoint Api V1 Options Operational Roles Get
Response Get Availability Statuses Endpoint Api V1 Options Availability Statuses Get
